changeSet.author: jdavid
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`asuragensamplelocation` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sample_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `rackname` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL, `position` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `FK_ASL_SAMPLE_idx` (`sample_id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_ASL_SAMPLE_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`sample_id`) REFERENCES `sample` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
